did.abstract: This collections contains material produced by the International Brotherhood of Teamsters Local 82 dating from 1937-2003. The bulk of the material dates from 1940-1960. Included are a variety of materials related to the day-to-day operation of the Local, such as correspondence, meeting minutes, meeting notices and attendance lists, dues ledgers, contract agreements, seniority lists, membership applications,contract negotiation and agreements dating.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:
Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository.

Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by International Brotherhood of Teamsters, 2012 [2012.082].

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into two series: Administrative files and Contract Negotiation and Agreements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records produced by the International Brotherhood of Teamsters Local 82. The material dates from 1937-2003 with the bulk of the material dated 1940-1960. Included are a variety of materials related to the day-to-day operation of the Local, such as correspondence, meeting minutes, meeting notices and attendance lists, dues ledgers, contract agreements, seniority lists and membership applications. Also included are contract negotiation and agreements dating from 1939-1981. Of particular note are correspondence and other materials from the National War Labor Board, which was established by President Roosevelt in 1942.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains IBT Local 82 Administrative Files dating from 1937-2003. The bulk of the material dates from 1940-1960. Included are a variety of materials related to the day-to-day operation of the Local, such as correspondence, meeting minutes, meeting notices and attendance lists, dues ledgers, contract agreements, seniority lists, event anouncements, membership applications, newspaper clippings and other miscellaneous items.

did.unittitle: Central Labor Union of Boston and Vicinity
IBT Labor-Management Joint Committee Meeting Minutes
IBT National Rubber Committee Meeting Minutes
IBT National Rubber Committee Meeting Minutes
Union Label and Services Trades Department

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains materials related to IBT Local 82 contract negotiation and agreements dating from 1939-1981. Included are agreement texts, meeting minutes, reports, correspondence and handwritten notes. Of particular note are correspondence and other materials from the National War Labor Board, which was reestablished by President Roosevelt in 1942.
